sqlMap.select:
SELECT toolholderid, sapcode, NAME, toolholdertype, brandid, ( SELECT NAME FROM brand WHERE brandid = a.brandid ) AS brandname, turningtype, figure, figure2, handletype, portsize, handoftool, featurecode, cutwidthmax, cutwidthmin, cseries, length, width, cuttingdepth, diametermax, cutdiametermax, cutdiametermin, aname1, atype1, aname2, atype2, aname3, atype3, aname4, atype4, aname5, atype5, remark FROM cuttoolholder a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.name = #name#
a.toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#
a.brandid = #brandid#
a.turningtype = #turningtype#
a.portsize = #portsize#
a.handoftool = #handoftool#
a.figure = #figure#
a.figure2 = #figure2#
a.featurecode = #featurecode#
a.cseries = #cseries#
a.length = #length#
a.width = #width#
a.bore = #bore#
a.thheadangle = #thheadangle#
a.aname1 = #aname1#
a.atype1 = #atype1#
a.aname2 = #aname2#
a.atype2 = #atype2#
a.aname3 = #aname3#
a.atype3 = #atype3#
a.aname4 = #aname4#
a.atype4 = #atype4#
a.aname5 = #aname5#
a.atype5 = #atype5#
a.remark = #remark#
(a.toolholdertype like '%$keyword$%' or a.portsize like '%$keyword$%' or a.handoftool like '%$keyword$%')
order by a.toolholderid desc

SELECT count(1) as count FROM cuttoolholder a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.name = #name#
a.toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#
a.brandid = #brandid#
a.turningtype = #turningtype#
a.portsize = #portsize#
a.handoftool = #handoftool#
a.figure = #figure#
a.figure2 = #figure2#
a.featurecode = #featurecode#
a.cseries = #cseries#
a.length = #length#
a.width = #width#
a.bore = #bore#
a.thheadangle = #thheadangle#
a.aname1 = #aname1#
a.atype1 = #atype1#
a.aname2 = #aname2#
a.atype2 = #atype2#
a.aname3 = #aname3#
a.atype3 = #atype3#
a.aname4 = #aname4#
a.atype4 = #atype4#
a.aname5 = #aname5#
a.atype5 = #atype5#
a.remark = #remark#
(a.toolholdertype like '%$keyword$%' or a.portsize like '%$keyword$%' or a.handoftool like '%$keyword$%')
order by a.toolholderid desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO cuttoolholder ( toolholderid, sapcode, NAME, toolholdertype, brandid, turningtype, figure, figure2, handletype, portsize, handoftool, featurecode, cutwidthmax, cutwidthmin, cseries, length, width, cuttingdepth, diametermax, cutdiametermax, cutdiametermin, aname1, atype1, aname2, atype2, aname3, atype3, aname4, atype4, aname5, atype5, remark ) VALUES ( #toolholderid# , #sapcode# , #NAME# , #toolholdertype# , #brandid# , #turningtype# , #figure# , #figure2# , #handletype# , #portsize# , #handoftool# , #featurecode# , #cutwidthmax# , #cutwidthmin# , #cseries# , #length# , #width# , #cuttingdepth# , #diametermax# , #cutdiametermax# , #cutdiametermin# , #aname1# , #atype1# , #aname2# , #atype2# , #aname3# , #atype3# , #aname4# , #atype4# , #aname5# , #atype5# , #remark#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Cuttoolholder set
sapcode = #sapcode#,
name = #name#,
toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#,
brandid = #brandid#,
turningtype = #turningtype#,
handletype = #handletype#,
portsize = #portsize#,
handoftool = #handoftool#,
featurecode = #featurecode#,
cutwidthmax = #cutwidthmax#,
cutwidthmin = #cutwidthmin#,
cseries = #cseries#,
length = #length#,
width = #width#,
cuttingdepth = #cuttingdepth#,
diametermax = #diametermax#,
cutdiametermax = #cutdiametermax#,
cutdiametermin = #cutdiametermin#,
aname1 = #aname1#,
atype1 = #atype1#,
aname2 = #aname2#,
atype2 = #atype2#,
aname3 = #aname3#,
atype3 = #atype3#,
aname4 = #aname4#,
atype4 = #atype4#,
aname5 = #aname5#,
atype5 = #atype5#,
remark = #remark#
figure = #figure#
figure2 = #figure2#
WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
update Machinetoolholder set toolholderid = null WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
update Bladetoolholder set toolholderid = null WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT brandid as value, name as text FROM brand
SELECT count(toolholderid) as count FROM cuttoolholder where toolholdertype = #toolholdertype# and brandid = #brandid#
SELECT figure, figure2 FROM cuttoolholder where toolholderid = #toolholderid#
